mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM noticeview
WHERE notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
WHERE notice_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice SET notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content}, staff_no=(SELECT staff_no FROM staff WHERE staff_id=#{staff_id});
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_read = notice_read + 1 WHERE notice_no=#{notice_no};
